hero.name: I'm Maroof Sultan
hero.description: Laravel Developer skilled in building scalable, performance-driven web applications with modern technologies and best practices.

right.caption: ABOUT ME
right.description: I'm a Laravel Developer experienced in designing, developing, and deploying scalable web applications. I specialize in backend architecture, REST APIs, real-time apps using WebSockets, and system performance optimization with tools like Redis and CI/CD pipelines.

service.caption: WHAT I DO
service.description: I specialize in backend development, high-performance systems, and seamless API integrations using Laravel and modern web technologies.
